trans-unit.source: Create an Orchard CMS web app from the Azure Marketplace
trans-unit.target: Create an Orchard CMS web app from the Azure Marketplace

trans-unit.source: A tutorial that teaches you how to create a new web app in Azure.
trans-unit.target: A tutorial that teaches you how to create a new web app in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Also learn how to launch and manage your web app using the Azure Portal.
trans-unit.target: Also learn how to launch and manage your web app using the Azure Portal.

trans-unit.source: Create an Orchard CMS web app from the Azure Marketplace
trans-unit.target: Create an Orchard CMS web app from the Azure Marketplace

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: The Marketplace makes available a wide range of popular web applications developed by Microsoft, third party companies, and open source software initiatives.
trans-unit.target: The Marketplace makes available a wide range of popular web applications developed by Microsoft, third party companies, and open source software initiatives.

trans-unit.source: Web applications created from the Marketplace do not require installation of any software other than the browser used to connect to the [Azure preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529715).
trans-unit.target: Web applications created from the Marketplace do not require installation of any software other than the browser used to connect to the [Azure preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529715).

trans-unit.source: For more information about the web applications in the Marketplace, see [Azure Marketplace](/marketplace/).
trans-unit.target: For more information about the web applications in the Marketplace, see [Azure Marketplace](/marketplace/).

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, you'll learn:
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial, you'll learn:

trans-unit.source: How to create a new web app from the Marketplace
trans-unit.target: How to create a new web app from the Marketplace

trans-unit.source: How to launch and manage your web app from the Azure Portal
trans-unit.target: How to launch and manage your web app from the Azure Portal

trans-unit.source: You'll build an Orchard CMS web app that uses a default template.
trans-unit.target: You'll build an Orchard CMS web app that uses a default template.

trans-unit.source: [Orchard](http://www.orchardproject.net/) is a free, open-source, .NET-based CMS application that allows you to create customized, content-driven web apps and websites.
trans-unit.target: [Orchard](http://www.orchardproject.net/) is a free, open-source, .NET-based CMS application that allows you to create customized, content-driven web apps and websites.

trans-unit.source: Orchard CMS includes an extensibility framework through which you can [download additional modules and themes](http://gallery.orchardproject.net/) to customize your web app.
trans-unit.target: Orchard CMS includes an extensibility framework through which you can [download additional modules and themes](http://gallery.orchardproject.net/) to customize your web app.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the Orchard CMS web app in [Azure App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714) that you will create.
trans-unit.target: The following illustration shows the Orchard CMS web app in [Azure App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714) that you will create.

trans-unit.source: Orchard blog
trans-unit.target: Orchard blog

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an Azure account, go to [Try App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=523751), where you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an Azure account, go to [Try App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=523751), where you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.

trans-unit.source: No credit cards required; no commitments.
trans-unit.target: No credit cards required; no commitments.

trans-unit.source: Create an Orchard web app from the Marketplace
trans-unit.target: Create an Orchard web app from the Marketplace

trans-unit.source: Login to the [Azure preview portal](http://portal.azure.com).
trans-unit.target: Login to the [Azure preview portal](http://portal.azure.com).

trans-unit.source: Click **New** > **Web + Mobile** > **Azure Marketplace**.
trans-unit.target: Click **New** > **Web + Mobile** > **Azure Marketplace**.

trans-unit.source: Create New
trans-unit.target: Create New

trans-unit.source: Click **Web Apps** > **Orchard CMS**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Web Apps** > **Orchard CMS**.

trans-unit.source: In the next blade, click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: In the next blade, click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: Create From Marketplace
trans-unit.target: Create From Marketplace

trans-unit.source: Configure the web app's URL, App Service plan, resource group, and location.
trans-unit.target: Configure the web app's URL, App Service plan, resource group, and location.

trans-unit.source: When you're done, click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: When you're done, click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: Configure the app
trans-unit.target: Configure the app

trans-unit.source: Once your web app is created, the **Notifications** button will show a green "SUCCESS" and your web app's blade will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Once your web app is created, the **Notifications** button will show a green "SUCCESS" and your web app's blade will be displayed.

trans-unit.source: Launch and manage your Orchard web app
trans-unit.target: Launch and manage your Orchard web app

trans-unit.source: In your web app's blade, click **Browse** to open your web app's welcome page.
trans-unit.target: In your web app's blade, click **Browse** to open your web app's welcome page.

trans-unit.source: browse button
trans-unit.target: browse button

trans-unit.source: Enter the configuration information required by Orchard, and then click **Finish Setup** to complete the configuration and open the web app's home page.
trans-unit.target: Enter the configuration information required by Orchard, and then click **Finish Setup** to complete the configuration and open the web app's home page.

trans-unit.source: login to Orchard
trans-unit.target: login to Orchard

trans-unit.source: You'll have a new Orchard web app that looks similar to the screenshot below.
trans-unit.target: You'll have a new Orchard web app that looks similar to the screenshot below.

trans-unit.source: your Orchard web app
trans-unit.target: your Orchard web app

trans-unit.source: Follow the details in the [Orchard Documentation](http://docs.orchardproject.net/) to learn more about Orchard and configure your new web app.
trans-unit.target: Follow the details in the [Orchard Documentation](http://docs.orchardproject.net/) to learn more about Orchard and configure your new web app.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.target: [Create an ASP.NET MVC app with auth and SQL DB and deploy to Azure App Service](web-sites-dotnet-deploy-aspnet-mvc-app-membership-oauth-sql-database.md)-- Learn how to create a new web app in Azure App Service from Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: What's changed
trans-unit.target: What's changed

trans-unit.source: For a guide to the change from Websites to App Service see: [Azure App Service and Its Impact on Existing Azure Services](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714)
trans-unit.target: For a guide to the change from Websites to App Service see: [Azure App Service and Its Impact on Existing Azure Services](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529714)

trans-unit.source: For a guide to the change of the portal to the preview portal see: [Reference for navigating the preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529715)
trans-unit.target: For a guide to the change of the portal to the preview portal see: [Reference for navigating the preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=529715)
